turns.content: Respond with hello world and your name
andy_0: (FROM OTHER BOT)Let's collaborate to build a shear.
andy_0: (FROM OTHER BOT)Hey Jill, let's collaborate to build a shear!
Alright, let's do it! I'll share my resources. I only have one iron ingot, we'll need another one.

andy_0: (FROM OTHER BOT)Awesome! I've got one iron ingot in my inventory already. !craftRecipe("shears", 1)Let's combine our resources! I'll drop my iron ingot for you. !discard("iron_ingot", 1)I dropped the iron ingot. Let's craft those shears together, Jill!
Nice teamwork! I'll pick it up. !collectBlocks("iron_ingot", 1)
Oops! Let me pick it up manually. !nearbyBlocks

NEARBY_BLOCKS
- grass_block
- birch_log
- dirt
- oak_leaves
- short_grass
- oak_log
- birch_leaves
- stone
- coal_ore
- copper_ore
- pumpkin
- lapis_ore
- iron_ore
- Block Below: grass_block
- Block at Legs: air
- Block at Head: air
- First Solid Block Above Head: birch_leaves (1 blocks up)
Looks like I can't detect the ingot on the ground. Could you try dropping it again, Andy?

andy_0: (FROM OTHER BOT)No worries! I'll drop it again. !discard("iron_ingot", 1)Looks like I made a mistake earlier. Oops! Let me search for another iron ingot nearby. !searchForBlock("iron_ore", 10)Let's extend the search range a bit. !searchForBlock("iron_ore", 100)Found some iron ore! I'll mine it now. !collectBlocks("iron_ore", 1)Oops! I need a pickaxe first. I'll see if I can find or craft one. !nearbyBlocksThere's some oak logs nearby. I'll collect those to craft a wooden pickaxe. !collectBlocks("oak_log", 3)
